::windlord::

Windlord saw Aerotaur's problem.

"What do you think that could be the trouble?" said at
last.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She ran back to Aerotaur. "What's the matter? Can't
> transform into 
> bot mode? Well,  don't try so hard.  Mom always told
> me not to think 
> about transforming, just do it." She smiled and
> meowed softly.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >       "I am Aerotaur and Trinity's guardian.  This
> mode is too 
> large I shall 
> > transform."  Aerotaur attempts to return to his
> robot mode and 
> fails again.  
> > "Hmmm ... curious." he thinks to himself.
> 
>
